title: Hillary Clinton’s male-voter problem — and 3 other remarkable 2016 stats
content:
Hillary Clinton’s male-voter problem — and 3 other remarkable 2016 stats   
 
12:43 GMT 
 
A new CNN/ORC poll shows half of Republican primary voters nationally now say Donald Trump is their first or second choice for president, as we noted Thursday. This is remarkable, because when he launched his campaign, two-thirds of Republicans had an unfavorable opinion of Trump, and polls even showed more than half of Iowa GOP voters said they would never vote for him. The new  …
